lines.text: I never did mind about the little things.
How about you kiss my ass right in the crack?
I'm Victor. I'm the cleaner.
So... you're going to give me this 'chance.' What do I got to do?
Learn, Maggie. Learn to speak properly; learn to stand up straight for a start. Then languages, computers, and so on. Do something to help your country for a change.
What if I'm not interested?
Row 48, Plot 12.

[picks up Maggie's album of Nina Simone]
Can I take this?
Yeah... sure.

[pause]
You like Nina?

[after a while]
Yeah. I love her.

[pause]
We'll miss her?

[gazes at the picture of Maggie on the wall]
Yeah. We'll miss her.

[does some karate moves and assumes a fighting stance]
I've taken my guard. See if you can hit my face.

[starts to circle the instructor, waving her hands and making sounds like Bruce Lee]
Hooooo. Waaa!
Come on. COme on.
[Maggie continues circling and making the noises and hand motions]
Hit me. Come on. Hit me.
[Puzzled and impatient, the instructor looks away from Maggie, lowering his guard]

[frustrated]
Aah.
[the instructor turns back to Maggie and she decks him right in the nose, knocking him down]
You can't just pout and decide you don't want to play anymore.
Oh, I think she's saying, "Stick it in me twice a day, and I'll do anything for you. I'll lick the ground you walk on."
He mentioned the word "bullet," and he mentioned the word "brain."
[in disguise as Angela]
For Christ's sake, give me a fucking break and open ze stupid gate!
Enough vis ze fucking tea already!
[Bob is waiting for Maggie as she returns from an 'assignment']
How are you?
I just blew up a hotel. How the hell do you think I am?
Why do you talk so dirty, Maggie?
Why do you talk so faggy, Bob?
You stupid ignorant little girl. You think you can just pout and decide that you don't want to play anymore? I mean where do you think you are? Don't you understand anything that I've said?
I mean it.
You don't know what you're talking about.
I'm through! I'm out!
Listen, which word don't you understand? There is no out, there is no through, there is no out!
Ask Me why im so serious
Why are you so serious?
Cos iv'e got serious stuff to tell you Maggie for Margaret.
